title: Roosevelt Campobello International Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Mulholland Point Lighthouse overlooks the town of Lubec, Maine.   You can spend several hours exploring Roosevelt Campobello International Park. Here are some ideas to guide your stay if you have... One Hour  Visit the Edmund S. Muskie Visitor Center, which contains exhibits and a video interpreting the Roosevelt story. Tour FDR's 34-room summer home to see what it looked like when he and his family lived there. Walk through beautiful flower gardens.  Two or More Hours  Enjoy a picnic lunch at Mulholland Point Lighthouse or one of the other scenic picnic areas. Hike the wooded paths and fields of the park's 2,800-acre (1,134-hectare) natural area.
